teal.visualization.image.ScalarImage

  • Packages that use ScalarImage 
    Package Description
    teal.visualization.dlic
    The top level IDraw package converted to use standard javax.vecmath and teal Field classes.
    teal.visualization.image
    Image processing and conversion classes.

      Constructor and Description
      DLIC(ScalarImage input, AccumImage canvas, Vector3dField field, javax.vecmath.Matrix4d projection)
      Integrate and Draw algorithm using a given input table, which can either be a random noise or some image to be manipulated.
